vote.title: To Recognize Thelma Mae Scott in Celebration of her 100th Birthday
vote.description:
Title
To Recognize Thelma Mae Scott in Celebration of her 100th Birthday
 
Body
WHEREAS, Thelma Mae Scott was born on November 8, 1923; and
 
WHEREAS, Thelma always gives from herself unto others, dedicating her career to public service and serving in the public school system for 27 years; and 
 
WHEREAS, Thelma is a beloved community member, actively involved in her church, neighborhood, and family, and has instilled her values and work ethic into all who have had the privilege of knowing her; and
 
WHEREAS, the City of Columbus is proud to recognize significant milestone birthdays and is joined by Thelma’s three daughters, eight grandchildren, eight great grandchildren, and countless other friends, family members, and loved ones in celebrating all that Thelma has accomplished in the last 100 years; and
 
WHEREAS, the City of Columbus recognizes that Thelma is turning “100 years young” and wishes her many more years of joy, health, and time spent with the people and things she loves; now, therefore
 
BE IT RESOLVED BY THE COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF COLUMBUS: That this Council recognizes Thelma Mae Scott in celebration of her 100th birthday.
